hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.task.report.TaskSummary( task.id, task.controllerName, task.methodName, task.description, sourceUserName.lastName, sourceUserName.firstName, sourceUserName.middleName, sourceUserName.suffix, sourceAccount.username, task.originationDate, task.completionDate) from omis.task.domain.Task task inner join task.sourceAccount sourceAccount inner join sourceAccount.user sourceUser inner join sourceUser.name sourceUserName where sourceAccount.username = :username
